subject: Margin Call Notice from (Client GEF - CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS EUROPE ) COB date: 14-Sep-2018
content:
Dear Sir / Madam,

Please find attached your margin call notice.

Please contact our office to confirm your agreement to the amount of the collateral movement and confirm settlement details.


Client GEF 






Disclaimer: This report is confidential, unauthorised use is forbidden. Please destroy if you are not the addressee.
